marklogic.body: Way to go Kris! I quit Cold turkey right about the same time (remember us tweeting about it!) and though the first couple of days were rough, and by 3pm each day I was miserable, it has gotten easier and easier. I don't crave it at all. I don't order it when I'm out. I haven't bought a case in a month. I have been drinking tons of water - almost 3 litres a day - and I'm sure that helps a lot! I'm super proud of you! When I see you at Blissdom, I'll happily buy you a bottle of water! Cheers!
